message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper is about a novel approach for measuring semantic relatedness using data mining techniques and natural language analysis. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the sub-category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). It also involves knowledge graphs and semantic analysis, which are relevant to Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the use of data mining techniques and artificial intelligence in the approach makes it relevant to Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI).
